name: Ext_R5_Encounter_class
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Encounter.class for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents Encounter.class from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Encounter|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Classification of patient encounter context - e.g. Inpatient, outpatient
element.definition: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.
element.comment: `Encounter` maps to R4 `Encounter`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Encounter.class` maps to R4 `Encounter.class`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
